mapper.select: SELECT lt.lec_seq, lt.lec_nm, lt.user_id, lt.lec_contents, lt.lec_tm, lt.lec_st, lt.lec_ed, lt.rm_seq, lt.upd_user, lt.enr_user, rl.user_id FROM tb_lecture lt, tb_request_list rl Where lt.lec_seq = rl.lec_seq AND ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%' AND lt.user_id=#{loginId} GROUP BY lt.lec_seq, lt.lec_nm
SELECT COUNT(1) AS tot_cnt FROM tb_lecture

SELECT lt.lec_nm, a.user_id FROM tb_lecture lt JOIN tb_request_list rl ON lt.lec_seq = rl.lec_seq AND lt.user_id = #{loginId}, (select rl.user_id from tb_request_list rl, tb_lecture lt WHERE rl.lec_seq = lt.lec_seq )a GROUP BY lt.lec_nm
